Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball hit a pair of game-winning free throws with seven seconds remaining.
Officials admitted after the contest that Giannis Antetokounmpo shouldn't have been called for a foul while Ball was driving to the basket.
LaMelo Ball scored 26 points, including 15 in the 4th quarter, along with nine rebounds and six assists.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball was fined $100,000 for making an offensive and derogatory comment during a televised postgame interview.
Doc Rivers expressed frustration over the controversial foul call, stating that the referee was blocked out by one of their players and shouldn't guess at the end of the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball leads the league in 4th quarter scoring, averaging 11.5 points per game in the 4th quarter this season.
